description: Try our easy to follow Hearty Easy Prep Beef Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Casserole,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hearty Easy Prep Beef Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre heat oven to 160°C. Heat oil in a large heavy-based saucepan. Add beef and cook, over medium heat for 3-4 mins until starting to brown. Add onion and cook, stirring for 1-2 minutes.
Add tomato paste and potatoes and stir to combine. Add Campbell’s Real Stock. Bring to the boil. Cover and place it in the oven. Cook covered for 1 1/2 hours, remove the lid and cook for a further
Garnish with parsley and serve with steamed rice.
